availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nancy Cordelia Brown Coffman (Married Confederate Lieutenant William Harrison Coffman)

body.p: Married William Harrison Coffman, a Hopkins County, Kentucky native who enlisted in 1862 as Second Lieutenant in the Confederate army, Hobby's 8th Regiment Texas Infantry, Company F.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, Entry for Nancy Cordelia Brown Coffman (1832-1875), Find A Grave Memorial # 46922102, Mesquite Cemetery, Lee County, Texas, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=46922102 (accessed 13 Aug 2017).
